meanings.definition: Smoothly continuous without any visible gaps or interruptions.
meanings.sent1: The transition between the colors was seamless.
meanings.sent2: The music flowed seamlessly from one song to the next.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed a seamless trick that left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her words wove a seamless tapestry of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved with a seamless grace that captivated the audience.

meanings.sent1: The story had a seamless plot that kept me engaged.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together seamlessly to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent3: The recipe turned out perfectly seamless, much to my surprise.
meanings.sent4: His argument was so seamless that it convinced everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The plan unfolded in a seamless manner, just as they had hoped.

meanings.definition: Done or made without any seams.
meanings.sent1: The seamless dress looked elegant and flawless.
meanings.sent2: The seamless welding made the metal structure strong.
meanings.sent3: The seamless cake decoration impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent4: The seamless integration of flavors created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The seamless design of the building made it stand out in the city.
